segments.text: That sink overflowing is disgusting; water's gushing out like a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, drying a plate—how gross, her foot's wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading across the floor, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies? In this filthy situation, it's just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, hand in the jar—germs everywhere probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's waiting with her hand out; do they not see the slop?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage on the cabinets looks nasty, like mold waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen's turning into a swamp, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes near the sink—splashed with water, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the peaceful garden view can't hide this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting soaked too; revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel queasy watching this unclean disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the faucet already; it's repulsive!
segments.speaker: PAR
